info.title: Tetris Custom
info.author: TheDrev
info.details:
This is yet another Tetris, but you can put your own sounds and graphics by editing the res/tetris.xml file.
	The Default skins are Keithris featuring Talking Classics' Keith Apicary (Screw Attack), and a classic skin named Russia.
	Post you skins to the wii brew wiki page at http://wiibrew.org/wiki/Tetris_Custom
